players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Alice here. I have crucial info: Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out now to protect the town."
Bob: "Alice's accusation is baseless and clearly an attempt to divert suspicion from the real mafia. I suggest we consider other possibilities before rushing to judgment."
Diana: " I don't think we should rush to judgment without considering all the information and evidence available. We need to be cautious and not jump to conclusions based on speculation."
Bob: "Alice's eagerness to accuse me outright is suspicious, especially since we lost Charlie last night. If Alice truly has proof, why not share details instead of just naming me?"
You: "Alice here again. I investigated Bob last night and confirmed he is mafia. I need you all to trust my role as detective to save the town. Voting Bob today is critical."
